comments.text:
Dear Markiplier.. 
I would really love, to please, have a reply to my comment from you, I'm 
scared.. Only because I has a lump below my left ribcage and the doctors 
don't know what it is, so its scaring me deeply. 
I just wanted to say this. Markiplier, you are the best youtuber I have 
ever seen. There is nobody better on YouTube then you in my eyes, POOF. You 
make me laugh when I'm sad, and when I'm down, you are like a best friend 
to me when though I've never met you in real life. I can rely on you to 
make me happy, by just seeing one of your videos. Also, if I may, can I ask 
you something?
Why are you so great, at being my role, model.. And my hero? 

~ Love, Dani.﻿
